name: voiceshell
0:
”Alexa open voice shell”
”Alexa launch voice shell”
”Alexa run voice shell”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: voice shell
des:
Engage the Voice Shell in a conversation on a topic of your choice. The voice shell is able to answer all your curiosities. It knows all the scientific and humanistic subjects, economics, politics, social sciences. You can ask it to summarize a book, write a poem or define the itinerary of a vacation. It knows everything up to 2021 and is at your service.
The skill connects to the chatGPT language model developed by OpenAI, trained using a large amount of textual data and able to answer questions and provide information on a wide range of topics.
DISCLAIMER: The information provided by the skill is for informational purposes only, and we decline any responsibility of any nature for any failure to report specific phenomena and for any consequence resulting from the interpretation and use of the information provided through the skill or derived from it in any form for further purposes.
If you want to add an advertisement or report an improvement, please send an email to revolutionary.voice.2020@gmail.com.
Thanks.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
